data.title: Vite App
data.meta_description: Robert Bender III - 2023-24 (Redshirt Junior) • Academic All-Big Ten Played 35 rounds across 12 events … compiled nine rounds at or below par, including a se...
data.text:
2023-24 (Redshirt Junior)

• Academic All-Big Ten

Played 35 rounds across 12 events … compiled nine rounds at or below par, including a season-low of 65 in the second round of the Fighting Irish Classic … posted a stroke average of 74.29 … earned three top-20 and two top-10 outings … finished 68th at the NCAA West Lafayette Regional with a score of 234 (76-77-81; +18) … tied for 60th at the Big Ten Championship after shooting a 235 (74-83-78; +25) … shot a 223 (76-71-76; +10) to place t-35th and propel the Hoosiers to victory at the Robert Kepler Invitational … helped lead Indiana to a win at the Hoosier Collegiate after shooting a 222 (72-73-77; +9) to tie for 13th … compiled a scorecard of 225 (77-73-75; +9) at the Seminole Intercollegiate to tie for 35th … tied for 26th with a scorecard of 212 (75-68-69; -4) at the Colleton River Collegiate … placed t-63 at the Battle at Briar’s Creek after shooting a 156 (76-80; +12) … tied for 69th at the Steelwood Collegiate with a three-round scorecard reading 234 (81-76-77; +18) … tied for 50th after shooting a 217 (68-72-77; +1) at the Quail Valley Invitational … posted a t-ninth finish at the Fighting Irish Classic with a score of 209 (74-65-70; -1) … played a scorecard of 211 (71-68-72; -2) as an individual at the Windon Memorial Classic to tie for 34th … shot a 222 (76-73-73; +12) to tie for 18th as an individual at the Earl Yestingsmeier Invitational … tied for 22nd at the 2023 Golfweek Hoosier Amateur at The Pfau Course after shooting a 224 (76-77-71; +11) prior to the start of the season.

2022-23 (Redshirt Sophomore)

Posted a career-low round average of 75.47 over 15 rounds of competition across five total events … carded a season-low round of 70 (-2) at the Purdue Fall Invitational … secured two rounds at or below par … finished t-49th as an individual at the Fighting Illini Spring Invitational after playing a 232 (82-77-73; +19) … tied for 45th as an individual at the Hoosier Collegiate Invitational after shooting a 232 (78-81-73; +19)… played a scorecard of 221 (74-73-74; +11) to tie for 51st as an individual at the Don Benbow Invitational… finished 70th as an individual at the Colleton River Collegiate after shooting a 232 (79-76-77; +16) … tied for sixth playing as an individual at the Purdue Fall Invitational with a three-round score of 215 (70-72-73; -1).

2021-22 (Redshirt Freshman)

• Academic All-Big Ten

Played five rounds across two tournaments … averaged 78.80 strokes per round … tied for 43rd as an individual at the Butler Spring Invitational with a two-round score of 149 (73-76; +9) … tied for 72nd as an individual at the Hoosier Collegiate Invitational with a score of 245 (79-80-86; +32).

2020-21 (Redshirt Season)

Did not see tournament action.

Prep/Personal

Joins the Hoosiers from Saint Xavier High School … finished tied for sixth at the 2018 State Championship, carding a 75-71, and recorded four top-two finishes and eight top-five finishes … ranked eighth in the state of Kentucky for 2020 by Junior Golf Scoreboard and is a two-time member of the Region 6 Team … in 2019, he led Saint Xavier to a runner-up finish in Region 6 Championship, carding five birdies … the previous season saw Saint Xavier win the Region 6 title and finish second at State … won the 2020 Golfweek Junior Tour event at the Pfau Course in August … son of Bob and Leslie … cousin of IU Men’s Golf alum Brendon Doyle (2014-18) … has three siblings – Reagan, Ryan and Riley … intends to major in Public Financial Management.

Year Rds. Strokes Avg. Low 2021-22 5 394 78.80 73 2022-23 15 1,132 75.47 70 2023-24 35 2,600 74.29 65 TOTALS 55 4,126 75.02 65
